text: Paul Gough is an British academic and painter who is the current Vice Chancellor of Arts University Bournemouth, England. He got his first degree and Master's degree in Fine Art and both from Royal College of Art, London. In 1991, he went further with a PhD on First World War Art. He is the former pro chancellor, dean of faculty of creative art and worked with BBC Radio. == References == Category:British academics Category:British painters Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Paul Gough
